title: Andrew Sheets: Are Negative Interest Rates Coming to the U.S. and UK?
description: As markets have begun to price expectations for negative rates in Britain and the U.S., Chief Cross-Asset Strategist Andrew Sheets breaks down the potential impact on consumers, savers and economic growth.
